Description.description: Describe in detail the steps discussed in this segment based on the visual and transcript

Category.description: Categorize the description to determine the main topic and purpose of the video segment.

SafetyInstruction.description: Identify what safety instructions are identified here

KeyTips.description: Identify the key tips discussed in this segment as a numbered list

KeyFrame.description: Identify the key frame in this segment that most clearly illustrates the key point of this segment. It must be a frame included in the markdown transcript. Output it in miliseconds - for example, 1188.
